parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> Team Switch

</value></part><part><name>gr4</name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Select a sound defined in the [[Description.ext#CfgSounds|CfgSounds]] of the mission to be played the first time the TeamSwitch tab is selected in the [[Briefing.html|briefing]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[onBriefingTeamSwitch]] soundName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> soundName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[onBriefingTeamSwitch]] "TeamSwitchVoiceOver";</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[enableTeamSwitch]], [[onTeamSwitch]], [[teamSwitch]], [[teamSwitchEnabled]], [[Description.ext#CfgSounds|CfgSounds]]
</value></part></template>
